item.title: Bus Shelter graffitied, 10th February
item.description:
1600GLA462 LECKHAMPTON after Co-op Shelter has multiple graffiti tags. (Not offensive, political etc.) Please can this be cleaned. Additionally, can the stop be re-named with the impending move of the co-op.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
